data.title: Bad Mexican fake food
data.text:
Everything here was bad, it wasn't like lalos in 1980-1990
Now the food taste like refried beans, dry rice, and expensive margaritas . You might have to get a loan at tour bank in order to drink one..  Not worth the money,,only good thing for men, on Wednesday nights they have plenty of hot woman, and good miraches, that's it,,

data.title: Lalo's at Midway Airport
data.text:
I think it's a stretch to say this is Mexican food. Lalo's does have menu items that have Mexican names, and most of the common taco/burrito ingredients, but I seriously doubt people in Mexico would eat at Lalo's if they had one there. 

 I wanted to have fish tacos, but they were out. Neither tacos nor burrito sounded good, so I tried something called Huevos Mexicano, with chorizo. It came with sides of beans and rice, which were edible. The huevos were not. My companion had  potato & egg tacos - nothing delicious about them. The tortillas were fresh, but that is the only good thing I can say about this restaurant. There were plenty of sandwich places in the same food court, and we regretted not trying one of those instead of Lalo's.
